page.title: 15IRVINE * MY DAY AGE 12
page.content: At{6.50}my friend Laura arrives, we both then leave and make our way to where the Guides are held. The Guides begin at{7.00.}We begin with collecting the 25p we pay each week, then we go into Patrol corners to do the work patrol leaders set. As I am a patrol leader, throughout every week I have to find things to entertain my patrol, sometimes we have things like crosswords,collage,keep fit,games or beetle drives set for them. After that the whole pack,company, do something together like a treasure hunt, game, nature trail or sports. Later we do work for trefoil badges or interest badges. That usually takes us to{9.00 when our guides finish. On arriving home I change into my night clothes and have my supper, I watch T.V.while I eat supper, then go to bed and read for a short time.
